name: 洪媽益
objective: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
schedule:
Week 1 Course Introduction
Week 2 Basic elements in writing/Punctuation and Mechanics
Week 3 Attitudes to writing
Week 4 Paragraph and essay writing
Week 5 General-specific texts/Thesis statement
Week 6 Information structure/Unity and coherence
Week 7 Writing Methodology
Week 8 Writing Data and Materials
Week 9 Writing Results
Week 10 Writing Discussion/Conclusion
Week 11 Writing Discussion/Conclusion
Week 12 Citation styles/Plagiarism
Week 13 Summarizing
Week 14 Writing Literature Review
Week 15 Writing Introduction
Week 16 Writing Abstract
Week 17 Peer review
Week 18 Term paper due
scorePolicy:
Weekly homework: 30%
Quizzes and exercises: 30%
Final paper: 40%
materials:
Swales, John and Christine Feak. 2007. Academic writing for graduate students. Second edition. Ann Arbor: The University of Michigan Press.
Weissberg, Robert and Suzanne Buker. 2007. Writing up research. Taipei: Crane.
